item.description:
BACK BY POPULAR DEMAND: Betsi's annual Collage-a-thon!

Here's Betsi's description of this event:

Inspired by virtual "a-thons" on the site AtcsForAll.com, we're going to spend a whole day (from 11am to 7pm) making collage artist trading cards using a few favorite tools and the materials provided. Live trading for the cards we create is highly encouraged.

I've done a few of these online and they are always a blast! The idea is you take a weekend (or in this case just a day) and make as many ATCs as you can, and trade, trade, trade. Once you get going you'll be amazed how much you create! I thought it would be even more fun to do it in person, with everybody creating in one place and trading live and in person.

We'll have lots of ATC blanks and sleeves available, and we'll start with some quick reviews for background techniques like  using tissue/ napkins for backgrounds and for rubber-stamped accents. We'll also cover some finishing touches, like using embossing powders with or without rubber stamps,  adding embellishments, using glazes and 'drawing in' to help unify your collaged piece.

Each collage-a-thoner will receive a packet of collage goodies. You are welcome to bring your favorite tools (preferred adhesives, scissors, pens, a few rubber stamps, inks, etc.) and a small assortment of special papers and embellishments. Got something you've been saving for something "special"? This is it! But please limit yourself to no more than a half-inch (or so) stack of ephemera.  Making art quickly often happens best when you are restricted to just a small amount of materials.

Trading will be informal. Just hold it up when it's done and say "Anyone want this one?" :)  At the end we'll display what we've made and (I hope) take some pictures of the ATCs...and conclude with a grand trading session!

WHO MAY ATTEND: Anyone (18+, please). But you must sign up on the NE ATC+ Meetup site (which requires joining the group; membership is free and there's no obligation).

HOW TO SIGN UP: These smaller sessions are often full with a waiting list. Reserve a place by RSVP-ing "yes" using Meetup's RSVP function. You may RSVP for a guest as well.

If your plans (or your guests' plans) change, PLEASE update your RSVP accordingly. Please do this right up to the start time of the event.

WHAT TO BRING: All materials will be provided (included in your cost for attending). Even basic supplies -- scissors, glue, tape, blank ATCS, etc. -- are available for your use.  But if you have favorite basics, by all means bring them. Even if you show up empty-handed, we can get you started.

CANCELLATIONS: In the unlikely event that we need to cancel---or even if we're just getting a late start--we'll post a message on the Web site and e-mail everyone who's RSVP'd "yes." So to be on the safe side, please check the Web site and your inbox before departing for ArtStudio 360!
item.how_to_find_us: Enter through front or side door; proceed up stairs to second floor

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: Collage-a-Thon 2012 at ArtStudio 360 in Holliston
